title: Portfolio — Leonardo Benvinda
hero_title: Hi — I'm Leonardo Benvinda, Computer Engineer
hero_sub: I build software and embedded systems. Explore projects below.
about_text: I recently graduated in Computer Engineering. My work covers web development, embedded systems and data projects. I value clean code, good architecture and practical results.
edu_1_desc: Focused on embedded systems, algorithms and software engineering. Final project: smart gas detector with IoT integration.
edu_2_desc: Mathematics and Physics emphasis. Participated in programming club and robotics competitions.
pos_1_desc: Worked on firmware for sensor integration and low-power communication. Implemented data acquisition and calibration routines.
pos_2_desc: Built front-end features with React, helped integrate REST APIs, and worked on performance optimizations.
project_1_desc: OOP, JavaFX, PvE that never loses, user ranking system.
project_2_desc: MVC, clean code, undo/redo, load & replay.
project_3_desc: Arduino UNO R4 WiFi, IFTTT notifications, Arduino Cloud dashboard.
project_4_desc: REST API, MySQL, producers & enthusiasts, analytics.
project_1_details: Tic Tac Toe built with Java and JavaFX. Includes AI PvE opponent, local ranking system, and responsive UI for desktop. The project emphasizes clean OOP design and unit tests for core game logic.
project_2_details: Sokoban implemented in Java using MVC architecture. Features include undo/redo, level loading, and replay functionality. Focus on maintainable code and level parsing.
project_3_details: Gas Detector using Arduino UNO R4 WiFi. Integrates MQ sensor readings, IFTTT notifications and a dashboard on Arduino Cloud. Includes calibration and power-optimization notes.
project_4_details: Rate-a-Beer: a Laravel app with REST API, MySQL database, authentication and analytics dashboards. Supports producer and consumer roles, reviews and ratings.
